item.title: About
item.description: My goal is to provide you with the highest quality legal advice for your situation. With more than 20 years of experience, I have represented clients in a wide variety of cases. Whether starting a business, protecting wealth and family or involvement in litigation, together we can develop a plan based on your needs. When litigation issues arise, I will work quickly and expeditiously to eliminate the problem and plan ways to avoid future legal complications.
